Text: This copy was crazy on my ps3. It freezes 2 different times. One time it froze for about 7 mins and another it froze for like 15 to 20 mins of the show. But it shows the last 10 mins. I just checked on my notebook. It does freeze but you really dont miss way too much on a eps that is 1 hour and 30 minutes around
BBfan is right it does freeze. I am just glad fakeasdf is putting them up . Thanks again !
